review: I was a little confused at the onboard preference for Amazon content. Not that I didn't expect it, but that it works strangely. For instance, when I do the voice search accidentally while watching Netflix, it doesn't stop or warn you or something that you'll be exiting the app. Also I wish you could sleep the thing more easily like if the sleep function came up when you voice searched "sleep".

review: Got as a Christmas gift. LOVE IT! The box is much smaller than I expected, about the size of a CD disk case, which was a pleasant surprise. It was super easy to set up, basically plug it in and follow the on-screen instructions. I was up and running in a few minutes.  I already had an Amazon Prime membership so am very happy to now access so many Prime movies for free! Works great, would highly recommend.
